LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.ColorScheme.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose the color scheme of the theme.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.Preset.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose your color preset of the theme.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.MobileNavigationPosition.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined mobile navigation positions

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.HeaderLayout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined header layout designs

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.FooterLayout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined layout designs for the footer

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.CategoriesHoverEffect.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined hover effects for the featured categories displayed on the home page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.CatalogPagesItemBoxesPerRow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose how many products will be displayed on one line on all catalog pages

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.AddToCartButtonStyle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined designs for the add to cart button

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.ProductPageLayout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined layouts for the product page: one column or two columns design

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.MegaMenuWithPicturesLayout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined layouts for the mega menu when categories with pictures template is selected

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.HideSecondMainSliderOnMobile
LocaleResource.Value: Hide second slider on home page on mobile displays

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Admin.Settings.ThemeSettings.HideSecondMainSliderOnMobile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose to hide the second slider on smaller resolutions. This is in case that you have the two sliders on the home page added

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Poppy.Footer.Information.Text
LocaleResource.Value: Put your short company information here. You can edit this from the Language string resources admin panel

LocaleResource.Name: Newsletter.Title
LocaleResource.Value: Subscribe to our Newsletter to be the first know about new items and upcoming promotions!
